entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
